pullrequest.title: Fix #19, direct all messages to std_err, remove errStream variable, since it is never used

content.raw:
It was causing pretty much all of the gzlog_TEST subtests to fail, since it was sending sdferr, sdfwarn, and sdfmsg to std_out, for example:
~~~
Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[1.3] to Version[1.4]\n  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.
~~~
[gzlog.Info failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/254/testReport/junit/%28root%29/gzlog/Info/)
content.html:
It was causing pretty much all of the gzlog_TEST subtests to fail, since it was sending sdferr, sdfwarn, and sdfmsg to std_out, for example:

Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[1.3] to Version[1.4]\n  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.

gzlog.Info failure
